Title: Relates to prohibitions on former members of the joint commission on public ethics
Summary: Prohibits former members of the joint commission on public ethics from appearing or practicing before any state agency or from serving in the executive chamber for a period of two years after their departure from the commission.
LawCode: Amd ยง73, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to prohibitions on former members of the joint commission on public ethics
